decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - That this concent for a limited period of five years expiring on ________________, whereupon the advert shall be removed.

Condition : 2 - All advertisements displays, and any site used for the display of advertisements shall be maintained in a clean and tidy condition to the reasonable satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 3 - Any structure or hoarding erected or use principally for the purpose of displaying advertisements shall be maintained in a safe condition.
Condition : 4 - Where any advertisement is required under these regulations to be removed, the removal shall be carried out to the reasonable satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 5 - No advertisement is to be displayed without the permission of the owner of the site or any other person with an interest in the site entitled to grant planning permission.

Condition : 6 - Noadvertismentt shall be sited or displayed so as to obscure, or hinder, the ready interpretation of any road sign, railway sign or aid to navigation by water or air so as to otherwise render hazardous the use of any highway, railway, waterway ( including any coastal waters) or aerodrome (civil or military).
description: Erection of double sided free standing pole mounted sign externally illuminated to frontage of premises.
